tool_description: During their routine summer fun, the two brothers Phineas and Ferb create their own language, Ferb Latin which quickly catches on. Now you can also access the language using this Ferbsome API.
name: Ferb Latin Translator
title: Ferb Latin Translator

api_list.name: /ferblatin.json

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: Text to convert to Ferb Latin.
required_parameters.default: Well, if by that you mean we should create a whole new form of communication, then I couldn't agree more
